A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A revolting and nihilistic destruction of Star Wars mythology.  Perversion of the characters\, bizarre and unnecessary sequences\, massively inconsistent - not just with the original character's presentations and the prequels\, but Force Awakens.  A horrible\, horrible movie.  And keep in mind the total elapsed time from the beginning of Force Awakens to the end of this film is ~10 days (maybe less - as few as three or four days).\n\nA horrible\, horrible film.  Frankly\, not even a Star Wars film.  An embarrassment.  See why Hamill hates it.
